If no audio plugins are available, a fallback dummy backend will be used. This should print out warnings if this is the case when you try and use QAudioInput or QAudioOutput. To fix this problem, make sure the dependencies for the Qt plugins are installed on the system and reconfigure Qt (e.g. alsa-devel package on Linux), or create your own plugin with a default key to always override the dummy fallback. The easiest way to determine if you have only a dummy backend is to get a list of available audio devices.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有可用的音频插件，将使用后备虚拟后端。如果在这种情况下尝试使用QAudioInput或QAudioOutput，则应该打印出警告。要解决此问题，请确保Qt插件的依赖项已安装在系统上并重新配置Qt（例如Linux上的alsa-devel软件包），或使用默认密钥创建自己的插件以始终覆盖虚拟后备。确定您是否只有虚拟后端的最简单方法是获取可用音频设备的列表。

trans-unit.source: If possible, render text with hinting in both horizontal and vertical directions. The text will be altered to optimize legibility on the target device, but since the metrics will depend on the target size of the text, the positions of glyphs, line breaks, and other typographical detail will not scale, meaning that a text layout may look different on devices with different pixel densities.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的话,在水平和垂直方向上渲染带有提示的文本。文本将被改变,以优化目标设备上的可读性,但由于指标将取决于文本的目标尺寸,字形、换行符和其他排版细节的位置将不按比例排列,这意味着文本布局在不同像素密度的设备上可能会有不同的外观。

trans-unit.source: If possible, render text with no horizontal hinting, but align glyphs to the pixel grid in the vertical direction. The text will appear crisper on displays where the density is too low to give an accurate rendering of the glyphs. But since the horizontal metrics of the glyphs are unhinted, the text's layout will be scalable to higher density devices (such as printers) without impacting details such as line breaks.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的话,渲染文本时不要有水平提示,但在垂直方向上将字形与像素网格对齐。在密度过低而无法准确渲染字形的显示器上,文字会显得更清晰。但由于字形的水平度量是没有提示的,所以文本的布局将可以扩展到更高密度的设备上(如打印机),而不会影响换行符等细节。

trans-unit.source: If possible, render text without hinting the outlines of the glyphs. The text layout will be typographically accurate and scalable, using the same metrics as are used e.g. when printing.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的话,在渲染文本时不要提示字形的轮廓。文本布局将是排版准确和可扩展的,使用与打印时相同的指标。

trans-unit.source: If possible, the device is truncated before it is opened. All earlier contents of the device are lost.

trans-unit.source: If propagateComposedEvents is set to true, then composed events will be automatically propagated to other MouseAreas in the same location in the scene. Each event is propagated to the next enabledMouseArea beneath it in the stacking order, propagating down this visual hierarchy until a MouseArea accepts the event. Unlike pressed events, composed events will not be automatically accepted if no handler is present.
trans-unit.target: 如果propertyComposedEvents设置为true，则组合事件将自动传播到场景中相同位置的其他MouseArea。每个事件将按照堆栈顺序传播到其下方的下一个启用的MouseArea，并向下传播此可视层次结构，直到MouseArea接受该事件为止。与 pressed 事件不同，如果没有处理程序，则组合的事件将不会被自动接受。

If set to false, backgroundColor() has no effect. Defaults to true.

trans-unit.source: If set to true, the X-rotation of the camera is wrapped from minimum to maximum and from maximum to minimum. If set to false, the X-rotation of the camera is limited to the sector determined by the minimum and maximum values. Set to true by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 true ，则摄像机的X旋转将从最小值缠绕到最大值，也从最大值缠绕到最小值。如果设置为 false ，则相机的X轴旋转将限制在由最小值和最大值确定的扇区。默认设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, the background drop shadow effect is enabled. If set to false, it is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 true ，则启用背景阴影效果。如果设置为 false ，则将其禁用。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, the sort is case sensitive. This property is true by default.

trans-unit.source: If set to Continuous, Compute command is executed everyframe. This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为Continuous(连续),则每一帧都会执行Compute命令。这是默认值。

If set to false, only the single layer specified by the
If set to true, reverses the sort order. The default is false.

trans-unit.source: If set to true, sprite particles will interpolate between sprite frames each rendered frame, making the sprites look smoother.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 "true",精灵粒子将在每一帧渲染的精灵帧之间进行插值,使精灵看起来更加平滑。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, starts the timer; otherwise stops the timer. For a non-repeating timer,
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为true,则启动定时器;否则停止定时器。对于不重复的定时器。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, the plain text edit paints the palette background on the viewport area not covered by the text document. Otherwise, if set to false, it won't. The feature makes it possible for the user to visually distinguish between the area of the document, painted with the base color of the palette, and the empty area not covered by any document.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 "true",则纯文本编辑会在文本文档未覆盖的视口区域上绘制调色板背景。否则,如果设置为false,则不会。该功能使用户可以直观地区分用调色板底色绘制的文档区域和未被任何文档覆盖的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, the plain text edit scrolls the document vertically to make the cursor visible at the center of the viewport. This also allows the text edit to scroll below the end of the document. Otherwise, if set to false, the plain text edit scrolls the smallest amount possible to ensure the cursor is visible. The same algorithm is applied to any new line appended through appendPlainText().
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为true，则纯文本编辑将垂直滚动文档以使光标在视口的中心可见。这也允许文本编辑滚动到文档末尾下方。否则，如果将其设置为false，则纯文本编辑将滚动尽可能最小的量以确保光标可见。相同的算法应用于通过appendPlainText（）追加的任何新行。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, the sort is case sensitive. This property is true by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为true,则排序区分大小写。此属性默认为true。

trans-unit.source: If set, a cursor should be shown inside the preedit string at position start. The length variable determines whether the cursor is visible or not. If the length is 0 the cursor is invisible. If value is a QVariant of type QColor this color will be used for rendering the cursor, otherwise the color of the surrounding text will be used. There should be at most one Cursor attribute per event. If several are specified the behaviour is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，则光标应在位置开始处的预编辑字符串内显示。 length变量确定光标是否可见。如果长度为0，则光标不可见。如果value是QColor类型的QVariant，则将使用此颜色来呈现光标，否则将使用周围文本的颜色。每个事件最多应有一个Cursor属性。如果指定了多个，则行为未定义。

trans-unit.source: If set, the background determines the implicit size of the gauge.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,背景决定了规的隐含大小。

trans-unit.source: If set, the edit cursor should be moved to the specified position in the editor text contents. In contrast with Cursor, this attribute does not work on the preedit text, but on the surrounding text. The cursor will be moved after the commit string has been committed, and the preedit string will be located at the new edit position. The start position specifies the new position and the length variable can be used to set a selection starting from that point. The value is unused.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，则应将编辑光标移动到编辑器文本内容中的指定位置。与 Cursor 相反，此属性不适用于预编辑文本，但适用于周围的文本。在提交了提交字符串之后，光标将被移动，并且预编辑字符串将位于新的编辑位置。起始位置指定了新位置，长度变量可用于设置从该点开始的选择。该值未使用。

trans-unit.source: If set, the spin box will display this text instead of a numeric value whenever the current value is equal to minimum(). Typical use is to indicate that this choice has a special (default) meaning.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,每当当前值等于最小值()时,自旋框将显示此文本而非数值。典型的用途是表明这个选择具有特殊(默认)意义。

trans-unit.source: If set, the typical Unix strip functionality is turned off and the debug information will remain in the binary.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,典型的Unix条带功能被关闭,调试信息将保留在二进制中。

trans-unit.source: If set, this component will be used to display the foreground in this column, instead of the columnForeground property in TumblerStyle.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，该组件将被用于在此列中显示，而不是在前台，columnForeground在属性TumblerStyle。

trans-unit.target: 如果设置，则此委托将用于显示此列中的项目，而不是TumblerStyle中的委托属性。

trans-unit.source: If setUrlHandler() is used to set a new handler for a scheme which already has a handler, the existing handler is simply replaced with the new one. Since QDesktopServices does not take ownership of handlers, no objects are deleted when a handler is replaced.
trans-unit.target: 如果setUrlHandler（）用于为已经具有处理程序的方案设置新的处理程序，则将现有的处理程序简单地替换为新的处理程序。由于QDesktopServices不拥有处理程序的所有权，因此在替换处理程序时不会删除任何对象。

trans-unit.source: If setting the audio role is not supported, an empty list is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果不支持设置音频角色,则返回空列表。

trans-unit.source: If setting this property it must be set after the plugin property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置此属性，则必须在设置plugin属性之后进行设置。

If you are adjusting many properties of the object whilst autoUpdate is enabled, this can generate large numbers of useless (and later discarded) requests.

trans-unit.source: If several categories are required, use several Settings objects, each with their own category:
trans-unit.target: 如果需要多个类别,则使用多个设置对象,每个对象都有自己的类别。

trans-unit.source: If someone doubleclicks on the scene, the scene will first receive a mouse press event, followed by a release event (i.e., a click), then a doubleclick event, and finally a release event. If the doubleclick event is delivered to a different item than the one that received the first press and release, it will be delivered as a press event. However, tripleclick events are not delivered as doubleclick events in this case.
trans-unit.target: 如果有人在场景上双击,场景将首先收到一个鼠标按压事件,然后是释放事件(即点击),然后是双击事件,最后是释放事件。如果双击事件被传递到与接收到第一个按压和释放的项目不同的项目上,它将作为按压事件被传递。但是,在这种情况下,三点击事件不会作为双点击事件来交付。

If tablet tracking is disabled (the default), the widget only receives tablet move events when the stylus is in contact with the tablet, or at least one stylus button is pressed, while the stylus is being moved.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用平板电脑跟踪(默认),则小组件仅在触控笔与平板电脑接触时,或在触控笔移动时至少有一个触控笔按钮被按下时,才会接收平板电脑移动事件。

trans-unit.source: If tablet tracking is enabled, the widget receives tablet move events even while hovering in proximity. This is useful for monitoring position as well as the auxiliary properties such as rotation and tilt, and providing feedback in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了平板电脑跟踪,则即使在近距离悬停时,小组件也会收到平板电脑移动事件。这对于监控位置以及辅助属性(如旋转和倾斜)以及在 UI 中提供反馈非常有用。

trans-unit.source: If tablet tracking is switched off, tablet move events only occur if the stylus is in contact with the tablet, or at least one stylus button is pressed, while the stylus is being moved. If tablet tracking is switched on, tablet move events occur even while the stylus is hovering in proximity of the tablet, with no buttons pressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果关闭了平板电脑跟踪功能,则只有在触控笔与平板电脑接触,或至少有一个触控笔按钮被按下时,才会发生平板电脑移动事件。如果开启了平板电脑跟踪功能,则即使在触控笔悬停在平板电脑附近,且未按下任何按钮时,也会发生平板电脑移动事件。

trans-unit.source: If that happens, first the operating system then QRandomGenerator will fall back to Pseudo Random Number Generators of decreasing qualities (Qt's fallback generator being the simplest). Whether those generators are still of cryptographic quality is implementation-defined. Therefore, QRandomGenerator::system() should not be used for high-frequency random number generation, lest the entropy pool become empty. As a rule of thumb, this class should not be called upon to generate more than a kilobyte per second of random data (note: this may vary from system to system).
trans-unit.target: 如果发生这种情况，首先操作系统，然后是QRandomGenerator会退回到质量降低的伪随机数生成器（Qt的后备生成器是最简单的）。那些生成器是否仍具有加密质量是实现定义的。因此，不应将QRandomGenerator :: system（）用于高频随机数生成，以免熵池变空。根据经验，不应调用此类来生成每秒超过一千字节的随机数据（注意：这可能因系统而异）。

trans-unit.source: If that happens, first the operating system then QRandomGenerator will fall back to Pseudo Random Number Generators of decreasing qualities (Qt's fallback generator being the simplest). Whether those generators are still of cryptographic quality is implementation-defined. Therefore, QRandomGenerator::system() should not be used for high-frequency random number generation, lest the entropy pool become empty. As a rule of thumb, this class should not be called upon to generate more than a kilobyte per second of random data (note: this may vary from system to system).

If the QBoxLayout is not the top-level layout (i.e. it is not managing all of the widget's area and children), you must add it to its parent layout before you can do anything with it. The normal way to add a layout is by calling parentLayout->addLayout().
trans-unit.target: 如果QBoxLayout不是顶级布局（即，它没有管理小部件的所有区域和子级），则必须先将其添加到其父级布局中，然后才能对其进行任何操作。添加布局的通常方法是调用parentLayout-> addLayout（）。

trans-unit.source: If the QBoxLayout's orientation is Qt::Horizontal the boxes are placed in a row, with suitable sizes. Each widget (or other box) will get at least its minimum size and at most its maximum size. Any excess space is shared according to the stretch factors (more about that below).
trans-unit.target: 如果QBoxLayout的方向是Qt :: Horizo​​ntal，则将这些框以适当的大小放置在一行中。每个小部件（或其他框）将至少获得其最小尺寸，至多获得其最大尺寸。任何多余的空间都会根据拉伸因子进行共享（有关更多信息，请参见下文）。

trans-unit.source: If the QBoxLayout's orientation is Qt::Vertical, the boxes are placed in a column, again with suitable sizes.
trans-unit.target: 如果QBoxLayout的方向是Qt :: Vertical，则将这些框放置在一列中，并再次使用适当的大小。

trans-unit.source: If the popup() is a QListView, it is automatically setup to display this column.
trans-unit.target: 如果弹出窗口（）是QListView，则会自动将其设置为显示此列。

trans-unit.source: If the timeSpec() is Qt::LocalTime and the resulting date and time fall in the Standard Time to Daylight-Saving Time transition hour then the result will be adjusted accordingly, i.e. if the transition is at 2am and the clock goes forward to 3am and the result falls between 2am and 3am then the result will be adjusted to fall after 3am.
trans-unit.target: 如果timeSpec（）为Qt :: LocalTime且所得的日期和时间属于“夏令时标准时间”转换小时，则结果将进行相应调整，即，如果转换时间为凌晨2点，并且时钟前进至凌晨3点并且结果落在凌晨2点到凌晨3点之间，然后将结果调整为凌晨3点之后。

trans-unit.source: If the timeSpec() is Qt::LocalTime or Qt::TimeZone then the date and time are checked to see if they fall in the Standard Time to Daylight-Saving Time transition hour, i.e. if the transition is at 2am and the clock goes forward to 3am then the time from 02:00:00 to 02:59:59.999 is considered to be invalid.
trans-unit.target: 如果timeSpec（）是Qt :: LocalTime或Qt :: TimeZone，则检查日期和时间以查看它们是否落在“标准时间到夏令时”的转换小时内，即，如果转换是在凌晨2点并且时钟已经过去向前移动到凌晨3点，那么从02:00:00到02：59：59.999的时间将被视为无效。

trans-unit.source: If the timeSpec() is Qt::LocalTime then an instance of the current system time zone will be returned. Note however that if you copy this time zone the instance will not remain in sync if the system time zone changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果timeSpec（）为Qt :: LocalTime，则将返回当前系统时区的实例。但是请注意，如果您复制此时区，则在系统时区更改时，实例将不会保持同步。

trans-unit.source: If the timeSpec() is Qt::LocalTime then the host system is queried for the correct abbreviation.
trans-unit.target: 如果timeSpec（）为Qt :: LocalTime，则查询主机系统以获取正确的缩写。

trans-unit.source: If the timeSpec() is Qt::LocalTime this will be the difference between the Local Time and UTC including any Daylight-Saving Offset.
trans-unit.target: 如果timeSpec（）为Qt :: LocalTime，则这将是本地时间与UTC之间的时差，包括任何夏时制偏移量。

trans-unit.source: If the timeSpec() is Qt::OffsetFromUTC this will be in the format "UTC[+-]00:00".
trans-unit.target: 如果timeSpec（）为Qt :: OffsetFromUTC，则格式为“ UTC [+-] 00:00”。

trans-unit.source: If the timeSpec() is Qt::OffsetFromUTC this will be the value originally set.
trans-unit.target: 如果timeSpec（）是Qt :: OffsetFromUTC，则它将是最初设置的值。

trans-unit.source: If the timeSpec() is Qt::TimeZone this will be the offset effective in the Time Zone including any Daylight-Saving Offset.
trans-unit.target: 如果timeSpec（）是Qt :: TimeZone，则它将是在时区（包括任何夏时制偏移量）中有效的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: If the timeSpec() is Qt::UTC this will be "UTC".
trans-unit.target: 如果timeSpec（）为Qt :: UTC，则为 “ UTC”。

trans-unit.source: If the timeSpec() is Qt::UTC this will be 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果timeSpec（）为Qt :: UTC，则该值为0。

trans-unit.source: If the GridLayout is resized, all items in the layout will be rearranged. It is similar to the widget-based QGridLayout. These offer a bit more convenient API, and improve readability.
trans-unit.target: 如果调整GridLayout的大小，则将重新排列布局中的所有项目。它类似于基于小部件的QGridLayout。GridLayout元素的所有可见子级都将属于该布局。如果只需要一行或一列的布局，则可以使用RowLayout或ColumnLayout。这些提供了更方便的API，并提高了可读性。

If the QVariant contains a pointer to a type derived from QObject then T may be any QObject type. If the pointer stored in the QVariant can be qobject_cast to T, then that result is returned. trans-unit.target: 如果QVariant包含指向从QObject派生的类型的指针，则 T 可以是任何QObject类型。如果存储在QVariant中的指针可以qobject_cast到T，则返回该结果。否则返回 nullptr 。请注意，这仅适用于使用Q_OBJECT宏的QObject子类。

trans-unit.source: If the QVariant contains a sequential container and T is QVariantList, the elements of the container will be converted into QVariants and returned as a QVariantList.
trans-unit.target: 如果QVariant包含一个顺序容器，并且 T 为QVariantList，则容器的元素将转换为QVariant，并作为QVariantList返回。

trans-unit.source: If the OpenGL implementation on your system does not support the requested version of OpenGL context, then QOpenGLContext will try to create the closest matching version. The actual created context properties can be queried using the QSurfaceFormat returned by the format() function. For example, if you request a context that supports OpenGL 4.3 Core profile but the driver and/or hardware only supports version 3.2 Core profile contexts then you will get a 3.2 Core profile context.
trans-unit.target: 如果系统上的OpenGL实现不支持所请求的OpenGL上下文版本，则QOpenGLContext会尝试创建最接近的匹配版本。可以使用由format（）函数返回的QSurfaceFormat来查询实际创建的上下文属性。例如，如果您请求一个支持OpenGL 4.3核心配置文件的上下文，但驱动程序和/或硬件仅支持3.2版核心配置文件上下文，那么您将获得一个3.2核心配置文件上下文。

If the QBoxLayout is not the top-level layout (i.e. it is not managing all of the widget's area and children), you must add it to its parent layout before you can do anything with it. The normal way to add a layout is by calling parentLayout->addLayout().

If the QBoxLayout's orientation is Qt::Horizontal the boxes are placed in a row, with suitable sizes. Each widget (or other box) will get at least its minimum size and at most its maximum size. Any excess space is shared according to the stretch factors (more about that below).
If the QBoxLayout's orientation is Qt::Vertical, the boxes are placed in a column, again with suitable sizes.

If the QGridLayout is not the top-level layout (i.e. does not manage all of the widget's area and children), you must add it to its parent layout when you create it, but before you do anything with it. The normal way to add a layout is by calling addLayout() on the parent layout.

If the angular distance between two consecutive points in a series is more than 180 degrees, any direct line connecting the two points becomes meaningless, and will not be drawn. Instead, a line will be drawn to and from the center of the chart. Therefore, the axis ranges must be chosen accordingly when displaying line, spline, or area series.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个系列中两个连续点之间的角度距离超过180度,任何连接两点的直线都变得毫无意义,也不会被绘制。取而代之的是,一条线将被绘制到图表的中心并从中心出发。因此,在显示直线、花键或面积系列时,必须相应地选择轴的范围。

trans-unit.source: If the animation is a parallel QAnimationGroup, the duration will be the longest duration of all its animations. If the animation is a sequential QAnimationGroup, the duration will be the sum of the duration of all its animations.
trans-unit.target: 如果动画是并行的QAnimationGroup，则持续时间将是其所有动画的最长持续时间。如果动画是连续的QAnimationGroup，则持续时间将为其所有动画的持续时间之和。

trans-unit.source: If the animation is already running, this function does nothing.

trans-unit.source: If the animation is currently stopped or has already reached the end, calling start() will rewind the animation and start again from the beginning. When the animation reaches the end, the animation will either stop, or if the loop level is more than 1, it will rewind and continue from the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 如果动画当前正在停止或已经到达终点,调用start()将使动画倒带并从头开始。当动画到达终点时,动画将停止,或者如果循环级别大于1,将倒带并从头开始继续。

trans-unit.source: If the animation is not paused or not running, calling this method has no effect. The paused property will be false following a call to resume().
trans-unit.target: 如果动画没有暂停或没有 running ，则调用此方法无效。在调用 resume() 之后，被 paused 属性将为false 。

trans-unit.target: 如果动画没有运行，则调用此方法无效。在调用 stop() 之后， running 和 paused 属性都将为false 。

trans-unit.source: If the animation is not running, calling this method has no effect. The running property will be false following a call to complete().
trans-unit.target: 如果动画没有运行，则调用此方法无效。调用 complete() 之后， running 属性将为false 。

trans-unit.source: If the animation properties changed, calling this method to reload the animation definations.
trans-unit.target: 如果动画属性发生变化,调用本方法可以重新加载动画定义。

trans-unit.source: If the buffer size is limited to a certain size, QWebSocket won't buffer more than this size of data. Exceptionally, a buffer size of 0 means that the read buffer is unlimited and all incoming data is buffered. This is the default. This option is useful if you only read the data at certain points in time (for example, in a real-time streaming application) or if you want to protect your socket against receiving too much data, which may eventually cause your application to run out of memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果将缓冲区大小限制为一定大小，则QWebSocket不会缓冲超过此大小的数据。异常地，缓冲区大小为0意味着读取缓冲区不受限制，并且所有输入数据都被缓冲。这是默认值。如果仅在某些时间点（例如，在实时流应用程序中）读取数据，或者要保护套接字避免接收太多数据（可能最终导致应用程序用尽），则此选项很有用的记忆。

trans-unit.source: If the depth of this image is 1, only the lowest bit is used. If you say fill(0), fill(2), etc., the image is filled with 0s. If you say fill(1), fill(3), etc., the image is filled with 1s. If the depth is 8, the lowest 8 bits are used and if the depth is 16 the lowest 16 bits are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个图像的深度是1,则只用最低位。如果说填充(0)、填充(2)等,则图像被填充为0s。如果说填充(1)、填充(3)等,则图像被填充为1s。如果深度为8,则使用最低的8位,如果深度为16,则使用最低的16位。

trans-unit.source: If the device is reporting low accuracy, then calibration might be needed before acceptable measurements can be provided. For more information, check your device's documentation on how to calibrate the magnetic sensor.

trans-unit.source: If the device's service was instantiated for the first time, the object's state is DiscoveryRequired. Therefore any service object instance created after the first one has a state equal to already existing instances.
trans-unit.target: 如果设备的服务是第一次实例化的，则对象的状态为DiscoveryRequired。指向外围设备上相同服务的所有服务对象的状态始终相等。这是由于内部对象数据的共享性质引起的。因此，在第一个实例之后创建的任何服务对象实例的状态都等于已经存在的实例。

If the file cannot be found, QLibrary tries the name with different platform-specific file prefixes, like "lib" on Unix and Mac, and suffixes, like ".so" on Unix, ".dylib" on the Mac, or ".dll" on Windows.

trans-unit.source: If the file name is an absolute path then an attempt is made to load this path first. If the file cannot be found, QLibrary tries the name with different platform-specific file prefixes, like "lib" on Unix and Mac, and suffixes, like ".so" on Unix, ".dylib" on the Mac, or ".dll" on Windows.
If the file path is not absolute then QLibrary modifies the search order to try the system-specific prefixes and suffixes first, followed by the file path specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件路径不是绝对路径，则QLibrary修改搜索顺序以首先尝试系统特定的前缀和后缀，然后是指定的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: If the file path is not absolute then QLibrary modifies the search order to try the system-specific prefixes and suffixes first, followed by the file path specified.
If the fill item is on the left: the handle belongs to the right item.

trans-unit.source: If the first specified locale cannot be accommodated, the Plugin falls back to the next and so forth. Some Plugin backends may not support a set of locales which are rigidly defined. In the above scenario, the set of supported locales is context dependent on the search location.

In this example, the set of supported locales is context dependent on the search location.

trans-unit.source: If the first tag in the document is <qt type=detail>, the document is displayed as a popup rather than as new document in the browser window itself. trans-unit.source: If the format is not satisfied, an invalid QDate is returned. The expressions that don't expect leading zeroes (d, M) will be greedy. trans-unit.source: If the format is not satisfied, an invalid QDateTime is returned. The expressions that don't have leading zeroes (d, M, h, m, s, z) will be greedy. This means that they will use two digits even if this will put them outside the range and/or leave too few digits for other sections.

trans-unit.source: If the format is not satisfied, an invalid QTime is returned. Expressions that do not expect leading zeroes to be given (h, m, s and z) are greedy. This means that they will use two digits even if this puts them outside the range of accepted values and leaves too few digits for other sections. trans-unit.source: If the handler for the press event rejects the event, it will be propagated further, and then another Item underneath can handle synthesized events from touchscreens. For example, if a Flickable is used underneath (and the MouseArea is not a child of the Flickable), it can be useful for the MouseArea to handle genuine mouse events in one way, while allowing touch events to fall through to the Flickable underneath, so that the ability to flick on a touchscreen is retained. In that case the ability to drag the Flickable via mouse would be lost, but it does not prevent Flickable from receiving mouse wheel events.
trans-unit.target: 如果新闻事件的处理程序拒绝该事件，则它将进一步传播，然后下面的另一个项可以处理来自触摸屏的综合事件。例如，如果在下面使用Flickable（并且MouseArea不是Flickable的子项），则MouseArea以一种方式处理真正的鼠标事件可能非常有用，同时允许触摸事件落入其下方的Flickable中，从而保持了在触摸屏上滑动的能力。在这种情况下，将失去通过鼠标拖动Flickable的功能，但是这不会阻止Flickable接收鼠标滚轮事件。

trans-unit.target: 如果指数等于或高于项目总数,则将新项目添加到现有项目列表中。如果指数为零或负数,则新项目将被添加到现有项目的列表中。

trans-unit.source: If the index isn't known, this function returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果不知道索引,该函数返回0。

trans-unit.source: If the index value is equal to or less than zero, the new bar set is prepended to the bar series. If the index value is equal to or greater than the number of bar sets in the bar series, the new bar set is appended to the bar series.
trans-unit.target: 如果索引值等于或小于零,则新的条形集被添加到条形系列中。如果指数值等于或大于条形图系列中的条形图组数,则新的条形图组被附加到条形图系列中。

trans-unit.source: If the input method accepts the event and wants to capture the trace input, it must return a new QVirtualKeyboardTrace object. This object must remain valid until the traceEnd() method is called. If the QVirtualKeyboardTrace is rendered on screen, it remains there until the QVirtualKeyboardTrace object is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入法接受该事件并想要捕获跟踪输入，则它必须返回一个新的QVirtualKeyboardTrace对象。该对象必须保持有效，直到调用traceEnd（）方法为止。如果在屏幕上呈现了QVirtualKeyboardTrace，它将保留在那里，直到销毁QVirtualKeyboardTrace对象为止。

trans-unit.source: If the input method accepts the event and wants to capture the trace input, it must return a new Trace object. This object must remain valid until the InputMethod.traceEnd() method is called. If the Trace is rendered on screen, it remains there until the Trace object is destroyed.

trans-unit.source: If the item has already been inserted somewhere else it won't be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项目已经被插入到其他地方,就不会被插入。

trans-unit.source: If the item inherits both QGraphicsItem and QGraphicsLayoutItem (such as QGraphicsWidget does) the item is really part of two ownership hierarchies. This property informs what the layout should do with its child items when it is destructed. In the case of QGraphicsWidget, it is preferred that when the layout is deleted it won't delete its children (since they are also part of the graphics item hierarchy).
trans-unit.target: 如果该项目同时继承QGraphicsItem和QGraphicsLayoutItem（例如QGraphicsWidget确实如此），则该项目实际上是两个所有权层次结构的一部分。此属性通知在销毁布局时对其子项目应执行的处理。对于QGraphicsWidget，最好是在删除布局时不会删除其子级（因为它们也是图形项层次结构的一部分）。

trans-unit.source: If the item is a layout, the implicit maximum height will be the maximum height the layout can have without any of its items growing beyond their maximum height. The implicit maximum height for any other item is Number.POSITIVE_INFINITY.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目是布局，则隐含的最大高度将是该布局可以具有的最大高度，而其任何项目都不超过其最大高度。其他任何项目的隐式最大高度是 Number.POSITIVE_INFINITY 。

trans-unit.source: If the item is a layout, the implicit maximum width will be the maximum width the layout can have without any of its items growing beyond their maximum width. The implicit maximum width for any other item is Number.POSITIVE_INFINITY.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目是布局，则隐式最大宽度将是该布局可以具有的最大宽度，而其任何项目都不超过其最大宽度。其他任何项目的隐式最大宽度是 Number.POSITIVE_INFINITY 。

trans-unit.source: If the item is a layout, the implicit minimum height will be the minimum height the layout can have without any of its items shrinking below their minimum height. The implicit minimum height for any other item is 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目是布局，则隐式最小高度将是该布局可以具有的最小高度，而其任何项目都不会收缩到其最小高度以下。其他任何项目的隐式最小高度为 0 。

trans-unit.source: If the item is a layout, the implicit minimum width will be the minimum width the layout can have without any of its items shrinking below their minimum width. The implicit minimum width for any other item is 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目是布局，则隐式最小宽度将是该布局可以具有的最小宽度，而其任何项目都不会缩小到其最小宽度以下。其他任何项目的隐式最小宽度为 0 。

trans-unit.source: If the item is a panel, the scene is active, and there is no active panel in the scene, then the item will be activated.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项目是一个面板,场景是活动的,而场景中没有活动的面板,那么该项目将被激活。

trans-unit.source: If the item is already in a different scene, it will first be removed from its old scene, and then added to this scene as a top-level.
trans-unit.target: 如果该物品已经在不同的场景中,则会先将其从旧场景中删除,然后作为顶层添加到这个场景中。

trans-unit.source: If the item is in a group, the whole group's selected state is toggled by this function. If the group is selected, all items in the group are also selected, and if the group is not selected, no item in the group is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目在一个组中,则整个组的选择状态由该功能切换。如果该组被选中,则该组中的所有项目也被选中,如果该组未被选中,则该组中没有项目被选中。

trans-unit.source: If the item is in its default state, that is, no explicit state has been set, then this property holds an empty string. Likewise, you can return an item to its default state by setting this property to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目处于默认状态,也就是说,没有设置任何显式状态,那么这个属性持有一个空字符串。同样,你也可以通过将此属性设置为空字符串来将一个项目返回到默认状态。

trans-unit.source: If the item is in the DownloadCompleted state, then nothing will happen. If the item is in any other state, then it will transition into the DownloadCancelled state without further effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项处于DownloadCompleted状态，则将不会发生任何事情。如果该项目处于任何​​其他状态，则它将转换为DownloadCancelled状态，而不会产生进一步的影响。

trans-unit.source: If the item is in the DownloadInProgress state, then it will transition into the DownloadCancelled state, the downloading will stop, and partially downloaded files will be deleted from disk.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项处于DownloadInProgress状态，则它将转换为DownloadCancelled状态，下载将停止，并且部分下载的文件将从磁盘中删除。

trans-unit.source: If the item is in the DownloadRequested state, then it will transition into the DownloadInProgress state and the downloading will begin. If the item is in any other state, then nothing will happen.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项处于DownloadRequested状态，则它将转换为DownloadInProgress状态，并且下载将开始。如果该项目处于任何​​其他状态，则将不会发生任何事情。

trans-unit.source: If the item is in the DownloadCompleted state, then nothing will happen. If the item is in any other state, then it will transition into the DownloadCancelled state without further effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项处于 DownloadCompleted 状态，则将不会发生任何事情。如果该项目处于任何​​其他状态，则它将转换为 DownloadCancelled 状态，而不会产生进一步的影响。

trans-unit.source: If the item is in the DownloadInProgress state, then it will transition into the DownloadCancelled state, the downloading will stop, and partially downloaded files will be deleted from disk.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项处于 DownloadInProgress 状态，则它将转换为 DownloadCancelled 状态，下载将停止，并且部分下载的文件将从磁盘中删除。

trans-unit.source: If the item is in the DownloadRequested state, then it will transition into the DownloadInProgress state and the downloading will begin. If the item is in any other state, then nothing will happen.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项处于 DownloadRequested 状态，则它将转换为 DownloadInProgress 状态，并且下载将开始。如果该项目处于任何​​其他状态，则将不会发生任何事情。

trans-unit.source: If the item is invisible (i.e., isVisible() returns false), this function does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项不可见（即isVisible（）返回 false ），则此函数不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: If the item is not a child of another item that belongs to the model, this function returns nullptr.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项目不是属于该模型的另一个项目的子项，则此函数返回 nullptr 。

trans-unit.source: If the item is not associated with a model, an invalid QModelIndex is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项目未与模型关联，则返回无效的QModelIndex。

trans-unit.source: If the item is not part of an active scene,
trans-unit.target: 如果该项目不是活动场景的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If the item is outside the visible area, -1 is returned, regardless of whether an item will exist at that point when scrolled into view.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目在可见区域之外,则返回-1,不管在滚动到视图中时,项目是否会在该点存在。

trans-unit.source: If the item is outside the visible area, null is returned, regardless of whether an item will exist at that point when scrolled into view.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目在可见区域之外,则返回null,不管在滚动到视图中时,项目是否会在该点存在。

trans-unit.source: If the item is removed from the scene, it loses the mouse grab.
trans-unit.target: 如果将物品从场景中移除,就会失去鼠标抓取功能。

trans-unit.source: If the item is visible (i.e., QGraphicsItem::isVisible() returns true), QGraphicsScene will emit changed() once control goes back to the event loop.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项目是可见的（即的QGraphicsItem :: ISVISIBLE（）返回 true ），QGraphicsScene会发出改变（）一旦控制返回到事件循环。

trans-unit.source: If the item is visible (i.e., QGraphicsItem::isVisible() returns true), QGraphicsScene will emit changed() once control goes back to the event loop.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项目是可见的（即的QGraphicsItem :: ISVISIBLE（）返回true），QGraphicsScene会发出改变（）一旦控制返回到事件循环。

trans-unit.source: If the item loses its mouse grab, the scene will ignore all mouse events until a new item grabs the mouse (i.e., until a new item receives a mouse press event).
trans-unit.target: 如果物品失去了鼠标抓取,场景将忽略所有的鼠标事件,直到新的物品抓取鼠标(即直到新的物品收到鼠标按下事件)。

trans-unit.source: If the item receives a mouse release event when there are no other buttons pressed, it loses the mouse grab.
trans-unit.target: 如果物品在没有其他按钮被按下时收到鼠标释放事件,它就会失去鼠标抓取功能。

trans-unit.source: If the item to which the focus is switching is not enabled or visible, an attempt will be made to skip this item and focus on the next. This is possible if there are a chain of items with the same KeyNavigation handler. If multiple items in a row are not enabled or visible, they will also be skipped.
trans-unit.target: 如果焦点切换到的项目未启用或不可见，则将尝试跳过此项目并专注于下一个项目。如果存在具有相同KeyNavigation处理程序的项目链，则可能发生这种情况。如果一行中的多个项目未启用或不可见，它们也将被跳过。

trans-unit.source: If the keyboard locale is different from the new default locale, keyboard language is changed immediately to reflect the new locale. If the locale setting is incorrect, or it is not in the list of supported locales, it is ignored and the default setting is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘语言与新的默认语言不同,则会立即更改键盘语言以反映新的语言。如果locale设置不正确,或者不在支持的locale列表中,则会被忽略,而使用默认设置。

trans-unit.source: If the keyword text contains spaces, the brackets are required.
trans-unit.target: 如果关键词文本包含空格,则需要使用括号。

trans-unit.source: If the language is found but the country is not, or if the country is AnyCountry, the language is used with the most appropriate available country (for example, Germany for German),
trans-unit.target: 如果找到了该语言但没有找到该国家/地区，或者该国家/地区是 AnyCountry ，则该语言将与最合适的可用国家/地区一起使用（例如，德国表示德语），

trans-unit.target: 如果笔记本电脑可以通过旋转或关闭显示屏外的盖子来转换为平板电脑,这就是所谓的后盖。

trans-unit.target: 如果纬度不在-90到90之间（包括端点），或者经度不在-180到180之间（包括端点），则不会设置任何值，并且类型（）将为QGeoCoordinate :: InvalidCoordinate。

trans-unit.source: If the layout is not dynamic, the most performant way to specify the layout is via static initialization of the x, y, width and height properties. Item coordinates are always relative to their parent, so if you wanted to be a fixed offset from your parent's 0,0 coordinate you should not use anchors. In the following example the child Rectangle objects are in the same place, but the anchors code shown is not as resource efficient as the code which uses fixed positioning via static initialization:

trans-unit.source: If the local Bluetooth adapter represented by an instance of this class is removed from the system (e.g. removal of the underlying Bluetooth dongle) then this instance will become invalid. An already invalid QBluetoothLocalDevice instance remains invalid even if the same Bluetooth adapter is returned to the system.
trans-unit.target: 如果从系统中移除了此类实例所代表的本地蓝牙适配器（例如，移除了底层的蓝牙加密狗），则该实例将变得无效。即使已经将相同的蓝牙适配器返回到系统，已经无效的QBluetoothLocalDevice实例仍然无效。

trans-unit.source: If the local directory contains a directory listing qmldir file, the types will be made available with the type names specified in the qmldir file; otherwise, they will be made available with type names derived from the filenames of the QML documents. Only filenames beginning with an uppercase letter and ending with ".qml" will be exposed as types if no qmldir file is specified in the directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果本地目录包含列出 qmldir 文件的目录，则将使用在 qmldir 文件中指定的类型名称来提供这些类型。否则，它们将具有从QML文档的文件名派生的类型名称。如果在目录中未指定 qmldir 文件，则只有以大写字母开头和以“ .qml”结尾的文件名才会显示为类型。
